metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Night Shift Pharmacist Lead
content:
Our Opportunity: As a Night Shift Pharmacist Team Lead for Chewy, you will support a team of top professionals that are committed to providing outstanding care and wellness services for the pet parents and their pets. In this role, you will be an integral leader of the pharmacy team and a partner in the overall Chewy eCommerce fulfillment network. Your success will be driven by your ability to lead and foster a culture of continuous improvement, quality, and incredible customer service. 
What you’ll do: 

Act as a liaison between pharmacy leadership and staff pharmacists to promote an environment of open and consistent communication across all shifts and locations. 
Participate in weekly pharmacist lead meeting to discuss topics in all areas of pharmacy including, but not limited to, reviewing workflow, regulatory compliance, continuous quality improvement, and system enhancements.
Assist pharmacy leadership in developing, managing, and coaching a group of staff pharmacists to help build a successful team.  Provide ongoing training and coaching as needed.
Assist pharmacy leadership in developing and maintaining clear and measurable expectations among the pharmacist team.   
Engage the pharmacist workforce by seeking out feedback after a process change. Hold small focus group roundtables as needed and report findings to the PIC and POM.
Analyze team performance to drive improvement in workflow and productivity. Provide consistent feedback to leadership.  
Identify training gaps and partner with pharmacy leadership to provide ongoing development plans for pharmacists.
Provide regular communication with PIC and POM on team performance.
Collaborates interdepartmentally  
Coordinates and modifies your group’s weekly schedules among sites according to current business needs.   
Upholds operational standards including performance metrics, safety, and compliance.
Perform all tasks of staff pharmacist.  

What you’ll need: 

Current Arizona pharmacist license 
Willing to gain any additional license as required 
Strong customer service and attention to detail
Ability to lead a team in a fast paced, high volume environment
Ability to work a variety of schedules including, evenings, holidays, and weekends 
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.
